snippet: Mr. Martin photographed a Nixon-Kennedy debate, as well as Kennedy’s funeral and the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.’s march to Montgomery, Ala....

headline.main: Ben Martin, Time Photographer Who Captured the 1960s, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: Ben Martin, Time Photographer Who Captured the 1960s, Dies at 86

lead_paragraph: Mr. Martin photographed a Nixon-Kennedy debate, as well as Kennedy’s funeral and the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.’s march to Montgomery, Ala.
